title: Expiration of registration, reregistration
context: §142-42 Expiration of registration, reregistration. Each brand registered under section 142-41 shall expire on December 31, 1960, and at each five year interval thereafter unless reregistered during the one hundred twenty days preceding date of expiration. [L 1893-4, c 57, §1; RL 1925, §682; RL 1935, §260; RL 1945, §1069; am L 1955, c 73, §1(b); RL 1955, §20-41; HRS §142-42]
